description: This solicitation is for the procurement of Local Internet Access Services ( LIAS) for federal government sites across Canada, on an as-and-when requested basis. Internet Service Providers (ISPs) are invited to prequalify their business through this solicitation. All suppliers that demonstrate the required experience and capacity will be qualified as part of the resulting Supply Arrangements (SAs) for opportunities to supply Canada with LIAS. The intent is to issue Supply Arrangements to all qualified ISPs.
full_summary:
**Local Internet Access Services (LIAS) Solicitation Notice**
=====================================================

**Title:** The Government of Canada is inviting tender for Local Internet Access Services (LIAS) to support federal government sites across Canada.

**Reference Number:** SSC-23-00021484

**Publication Date:** November 8, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** April 27, 2065

**Procurement Category:** SRV

**Procurement Method:**

* Competitive - Open bidding is being used to select a procurement partner.
* The intention is to establish a supply arrangement with multiple ISPs.

**Tender Description:**
Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking a Local Internet Access Services (LIAS) provider to deliver high-speed internet services to federal government sites across Canada. This procurement is focused on providing internet services for SSC itself, its exclusive Partner Organizations, Mandatory Clients, and other Government Organizations that choose to use SSC for procurement.

**Key Objectives:**

* Establish a list of qualified ISPs for future exclusive competition of LIAS requirements.
* Standardize and streamline contract award processes.
* Formalize and consolidate pre-existing Legacy and Contracted Connections.

**Key Requirements:**

* The procurement is open to any ISP that can demonstrate the required experience and capacity.
* Suppliers must be registered on the Procure to Pay (P2P) Portal to participate in the tender process.
* Interested parties must review the procurement documents and submit a response as per the requirements.

**Additional Information:**

* Trade Agreements:
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ ...and other relevant trade agreements.
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Contracting Entity: Shared Services Canada

**How to Participate:**

* Suppliers must register on the Procure to Pay (P2P) Portal to participate in the tender process.
* For more information, please contact Akram Itani via phone at (343) 550-6189 or by email at [Akram.Itani@promsgc.ca](mailto:Akram.Itani@promsgc.ca).

**Attachments:**

* Contracts
* TA Protocols
* Appendices
